entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
